TableField.name: ClaimID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track claims related to a specific loss

TableField.name: IncidentReportID
TableField.phrase: Incident Report|A description of the incident reported based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Incident Reports module

ForeignField.name: EventDate
ForeignField.phrase: Event Date|Date the situation or incident occurred

ForeignField.name: IncidentReport
ForeignField.phrase: Incident Reported|A description of the incident reported based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Incident Reports module
ForeignField.sample: Clovis; 10-28-2003; Stormwater Release to Dry Creek Irrigation Canal

TableField.name: RelatedModuleID
TableField.phrase: Related Module ID|The ModuleID of the Loss Module that this claim refers to

ForeignField.name: RelatedModule
ForeignField.phrase: Related Loss Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the claim

TableField.name: RelatedRecordID
TableField.phrase: Related Record ID|The record id of the loss record that this claim refers to

DynamicForeignField.name: RelatedRecord
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Related Loss Record Description|A description of the related loss record based on a combination of field values assigned from within the related module

DynamicForeignField.name: RelatedRecordDescription
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Related Record Description|A description of the related record based on a combination of field values assigned from within the related module

LinkField.name: RelatedRecordLink
LinkField.phrase: Related Record Link|An internal link to the related record.

DynamicForeignField.name: OwnerOrganizationID
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Related Loss Organization|The name of the organization associated with the related loss record

ForeignField.name: OwnerOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization responsible for the location where this release occurred

RemoteField.name: ReportDate
RemoteField.phrase: Report Date|Date the loss was reported

RemoteField.name: PersonReportingID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Reporting|The name of the individual that reported the environmental loss

ForeignField.name: PersonReporting
ForeignField.phrase: Person Reporting|The name of the individual that reported the environmental loss

TableField.name: TimeDeterminable
TableField.phrase: Time Determinable?|Whether the time the loss occurred is determinable

RemoteField.name: IncurredTime
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred Date|Date the loss was incurred

RecordMetaField.name: SubmittedByID
RecordMetaField.phrase: Entry Date|Date the loss was first entered into the system

ForeignField.name: SubmittedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Submitted By|The name of the individual that submitted this report into the system

RecordMetaField.name: EntryDate
RecordMetaField.phrase: Entry Date|Date the loss was first entered into the system

TableField.name: PolicyID
TableField.phrase: Policy|A description of the insurance policy based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Insurance Policies module

ForeignField.name: InsuranceTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Type|The type of insurance policy associated with the related record

ForeignField.name: InsuranceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

CodeField.name: InsuranceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

ForeignField.name: InsuranceType
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Type|The type of insurance policy associated with the related record

ForeignField.name: IntegrationKey
ForeignField.phrase: Integration Key|An alpha, numeric, or alphanumeric value assigned by the claims administration company to enable data sharing between the claims administrator and the organization

ForeignField.name: Policy
ForeignField.phrase: Policy|A description of the insurance policy based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Insurance Policies module
ForeignField.sample: General Liability; Chubb; GL-19928-2003; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2003, 03-02-2004

RemoteField.name: ClaimDate
RemoteField.phrase: Claim Date|Date the claim was officially submitted to an insurance carrier or third party administrator

TableField.name: ClaimNumber
TableField.phrase: Claim Number|A unique number assigned by an insurance company or third party administrator responsible for managing the claim

RemoteField.name: ClaimsAdjusterID
RemoteField.phrase: Claims Adjuster|The individual assigned primary accountability for adjusting this claim and mitigating the associated loss

ForeignField.name: ClaimsAdjuster
ForeignField.phrase: Claims Adjuster|The individual assigned primary accountability for adjusting this claim and mitigating the associated loss

TableField.name: OnCoPropID
TableField.phrase: On Company Property|This box should be checked if the release occurred on company property

CodeField.name: OnCoProp
CodeField.phrase: On Company Property|This box should be checked if the release occurred on company property

RemoteField.name: LocationID
RemoteField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the environmental release occurred

ForeignField.name: LocationOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization associated with the loss location

ForeignField.name: LocationOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization associated with the loss location

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the environmental release occurred

RemoteField.name: LocalClaimManagerID
RemoteField.phrase: Local Claim Manager|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this claim and mitigating the associated loss

ForeignField.name: LocalClaimManager
ForeignField.phrase: Local Claim Manager|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this claim and mitigating the associated loss

TableField.name: IncurredLocationDesc
TableField.phrase: Location Description|A detailed description of the location where the release occurred

TableField.name: IncurredAddress1
TableField.phrase: Incurred Address|First physical street address of the location where the environmental loss occurred

TableField.name: IncurredAddress2
TableField.phrase: Incurred Address|Second physical street address of the location where the environmental loss occurred; such as, suite number or p.o. box

TableField.name: IncurredCountyID
TableField.phrase: Incurred County|A combined field used to track and associate counties

ForeignField.name: IncurredCountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred Country|The name of the country where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredCountry
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred Country|The name of the country where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredStateID
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred State|The name of the state where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredState
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred State|The name of the state where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredCounty
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred County|A combined field used to track and associate counties

TableField.name: IncurredCity
TableField.phrase: Incurred City|City where the release occurred

TableField.name: IncurredPostalCode
TableField.phrase: Incurred Postal Code|Postal code used to direct mail to the physical street address where the release occurred

TableField.name: LossStatusTypeID
TableField.phrase: Loss Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LossStatusCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Loss Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

CodeField.name: LossStatusCategory
CodeField.phrase: Loss Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

ForeignField.name: LossStatusType
ForeignField.phrase: Loss Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: GeneralLossStatusDescription
ForeignField.phrase: General Status Description|A detailed description of the loss status type
ForeignField.sample: Claims of loss that are open and the claimant is actively seeking treatment and/or engaging the adjuster towards a resolution

TableField.name: SpecificLossStatusDescription
TableField.phrase: Specific Status Description|A detailed description of the status of the specific claim of loss
TableField.sample: The settlement offer is under consideration by the claimant. We offer a settlement every six months and the claimant has indicated a desire to settle the claim this time.

RemoteField.name: ClosureDate
RemoteField.phrase: Claim Closure Date|The date the claim was closed

RemoteField.name: LossLegitimacyTypeID
RemoteField.phrase: Legitimacy Type|A combined field used to describe the legitimacy type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LegitimacyCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group claims of similar loss legitimacy

CodeField.name: LegitimacyCategory
CodeField.phrase: Legitimacy Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group claims of similar loss legitimacy

ForeignField.name: LegitimacyDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Description|A brief, but detailed, description of the legitimacy type
ForeignField.sample: Any loss claim that results from an indisputable, work-related, injury and the injured person is actively engaged in proactive treatment towards revovery.

ForeignField.name: LossLegitimacyType
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Type|A combined field used to describe the legitimacy type when associating it with other records

CalculatedField.name: ReportDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Loss Report Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the loss was incurred and the date the loss was reported

CalculatedField.name: EntryDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: System Entry Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the loss was reported and the date the loss was entered into the system

CalculatedField.name: ClaimDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Claim Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the incurred date and the date the claim was formally submitted

CalculatedField.name: ClosureDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Claim Closure Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the incurred date and the claim closure date

CalculatedField.name: IncurredDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Loss Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the event occurred and the loss was incurred

SummaryField.name: InsurancePolicies
SummaryField.phrase: Insurance Policies|A list of insurance policies associated with the loss

ForeignField.name: LatestValuationDate
ForeignField.phrase: Latest Valuation|The date of the latest valuation for this loss item

SummaryField.name: RelatedCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Other Costs Incurred|The total estimated amount of non-claims costs associated with this loss

CalculatedField.name: TotalCost
CalculatedField.phrase: Total Costs Incurred|The total loss cost to date as stated in the currency of assigned to the site. The total loss cost includes claims costs and costs to manage or mitigate the loss

SummaryField.name: TotalIncurred
SummaryField.phrase: Claim Costs Incurred|The total estimated amount of the cost to manage and mitigate this claim of loss, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

SummaryField.name: TotalPayments
SummaryField.phrase: Claim Paid|The total payments actually made to manage and mitigate this claim of loss, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

CalculatedField.name: TotalOutstanding
CalculatedField.phrase: Claim Outstanding|The outstanding reserve available to manage and mitigate this claim of loss, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software. The outstanding reserve is the difference between Total Incurred and the Paid to Date amounts

LinkField.name: SourceRecordLink
LinkField.phrase: Related Record Link|An internal link to the related record.

CombinedField.name: IncurredDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Loss Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the event occurred and the loss was incurred

CombinedField.name: ReportDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Loss Report Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the loss was incurred and the date the loss was reported

CombinedField.name: EntryDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: System Entry Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date the loss was reported and the date the loss was entered into the system

CombinedField.name: ClaimDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Claim Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the incurred date and the date the claim was formally submitted

CombinedField.name: ClosureDelayCalc
CombinedField.phrase: Claim Closure Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the incurred date and the claim closure date

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Claim
CombinedField.phrase: Claim|A combined field used to describe this claim when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Storm Water; Benzene; Active Agenda, HQ; Packaging Area; 02-22-2004

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about the claim

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about the claim

EditScreen.name: LossLocation
EditScreen.phrase: Location|Edit summary information about the claim location

EditScreen.name: LossStatus
EditScreen.phrase: Status|Edit summary information about the claim status

EditScreen.name: LossLegitimacy
EditScreen.phrase: Legitimacy|Edit summary information about the claim legitimacy

EditScreen.name: LossCosts
EditScreen.phrase: Claim Costs|Associate claim costs with the claim

EditScreen.name: Characteristics
EditScreen.phrase: Characteristics|Associate claim characteristics with the claim

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
